lead_paragraph: Brook Lopez of the Nets led all scorers with 36 points, but Damian Lillard and C.J. McCollum each scored 34 in Portland’s sixth straight victory.

headline.print_headline: Trail Blazers Pull Away From Nets in Final Minutes
headline.main: Trail Blazers Pull Away From Nets in Final Minutes

snippet: Brook Lopez of the Nets led all scorers with 36 points, but Damian Lillard and C.J. McCollum each scored 34 in Portland’s sixth straight victory.
